title: Love this scale!
content: Our bathroom scale broke so we had to replace it.  There are so many out there to choose from!  I looked at a variety of scales and this one kept appealing to me the most.  The reviews were good and I love the look.  Black with the clear base.  It sort of blends into our floor so it does not stand out.  It is very accurate and lights up for a few seconds when it's dark so that you can read it, AND the numbers are large enough to see easily.  I can weigh myself and get a certain number, then drink 4 oz (ish) of water.... then get back on the scale and it will reflect that small amount of weight gain.  Not all scales do that.  I am very happy with the purchase and highly recommend it.
